1.0.name: wordpress/tweet-cloud
1.0.description: Cloud of popular words and phrases from a user's Twitter profile. Instead of using a tag cloud, which is dependent on your posts and options, Tweet Cloud aggregates the most common words mentioned on your Twitter profile and keeps your users up to date with the latest trending topics that are interesting you.
